chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
codeF: Functions L -> nat
codeR: Relations L -> nat
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
codeFormula: fol.Formula L -> nat
codeTerm: fol.Term L -> nat

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v w s2 : nat), ReplaceTermsTerm (codeTerms L codeF n (substituteTerms L n ts v (var w))) s2 = ReplaceTermsTerm (codeTerms L codeF n ts) s2

Premises:
codeTerms : forall L : Language, (Functions L -> nat) -> forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> nat
Trying to mask the absolute name "apply"! [masking-absolute-name,deprecated]
Notation Formula := (fol.Formula L)
Functions = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Functions : Language -> Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation Terms := (fol.Terms L)
arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat
Relations = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Relations : Language -> Set
ReplaceTermsTerm = fun t s : nat => cPairPi2 (ReplaceTermTermsTerm t s) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments ReplaceTermsTerm (_ _)%nat_scope
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code.codeTerm L codeF : fol.Term L -> nat |- Type] ?B : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code
substituteTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n
codeSubTermsCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), codeSubTerms (codeTerms L codeF n ts) v (code.codeTerm L codeF s) = codeTerms L codeF n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)
boundSubTerms : forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), codeTerms L codeF n (substituteTerms L n ts v s) <= ReplaceTermsTerm (codeTerms L codeF n ts) (fold_right Nat.max 0 (codeTerm s :: freeVarTerms L n ts))
codeFreeVarTermsCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n), codeFreeVarTerms (codeTerms L codeF n ts) = codeList (freeVarTerms L n ts)
codeTermsInj : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> forall (n : nat) (ts ss : fol.Terms L n), codeTerms L codeF n ts = codeTerms L codeF n ss -> ts = ss

fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code.codeTerm L codeF : fol.Term L -> nat |- Type] ?B : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code.codeTerm L codeF : fol.Term L -> nat |- Type]

pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code.codeTerm L codeF : fol.Term L -> nat |- Type] ?B : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code.codeTerm L codeF : fol.Term L -> nat |- Type]
subTermFunction : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerm L (fol.apply L f ts) v s = fol.apply L f (substituteTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts v s)
nil : list ?A where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code.codeTerm L codeF : fol.Term L -> nat |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat codeR : Relations L -> nat var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L codeFormula := code.codeFormula L codeF codeR : fol.Formula L -> nat codeTerm := code.codeTerm L codeF : fol.Term L -> nat |- Type]
ReplaceTermTermSub : forall (t : fol.Term L) (v w s2 : nat), ReplaceTermTerm (codeTerm (substituteTerm L t v (var w))) s2 = ReplaceTermTerm (codeTerm t) s2
Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> fol.Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : fol.Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n) Arguments fol.var _ _%nat_scope Arguments fol.Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
Terms_Term_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
Terms_Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Set) (P0 : nat -> Set), (nat -> P) -> (forall f0 : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0)) -> P0 (arity L (inr f0)) -> P) -> P0 0 -> (forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> P -> fol.Terms L n -> P0 n -> P0 (S n)) -> forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> P0 n
Term_Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Set) (P0 : nat -> Set), (nat -> P) -> (forall f0 : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0)) -> P0 (arity L (inr f0)) -> P) -> P0 0 -> (forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> P -> fol.Terms L n -> P0 n -> P0 (S n)) -> fol.Term L -> P
freeVarTermApply : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))), freeVarTerm L (fol.apply L f ts) = freeVarTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts
codeTermInj : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> forall t s : fol.Term L, code.codeTerm L codeF t = code.codeTerm L codeF s -> t = s
subFormulaRelation : forall (L : Language) (r : Relations L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (atomic L r ts) v s = atomic L r (substituteTerms L (arity L (inl r)) ts v s)
codeFormulaInj : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> (forall R S : Relations L, codeR R = codeR S -> R = S) -> forall f g : fol.Formula L, code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f = code.codeFormula L codeF codeR g -> f = g
Tcons : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n)
codeForallCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (n : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), codeForall n (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR a) = code.codeFormula L codeF codeR (forallH L n a)
subTermsId : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat), substituteTerms L n ts v (fol.var L v) = ts
fol.apply : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L), fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
codePrfInjAxm : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat), (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) -> (forall R S : Relations L, codeR R = codeR S -> R = S) -> forall (a b : fol.Formula L) (A B : fol.Formulas L) (p : folProof.Prf L A a) (q : folProof.Prf L B b), codePrf L codeF codeR A a p = codePrf L codeF codeR B b q -> A = B
Formula_depth_ind2 : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_depth_rec2 : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : fol.Formula L, P a
Term_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Formula_depth_rec2rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : fol.Formula L, (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a
codeSubTermCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), codeSubTerm (code.codeTerm L codeF t) v (code.codeTerm L codeF s) = code.codeTerm L codeF (substituteTerm L t v s)
Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> SProp), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t

```coq
intros n ts v w s2. unfold ReplaceTermsTerm. rewrite codeSubTermsCorrect.
rewrite codeSubTermsCorrect. reflexivity.
Qed.```
